Package com.mineinjava.quail.pathing

Class PathFollower

java.lang.Object
com.mineinjava.quail.pathing.PathFollower
public class PathFollower extends Object
Class that helps you follow paths

  • Method Details

    • calculateNextDriveMovement

      public RobotMovement calculateNextDriveMovement()
      Calculate the next movement to follow the path.

      This does return a field-centric movement vector.

      Returns:
      the next movement to follow the path

    • isFinished

      public Boolean isFinished()
      returns true if the robot is finished following the path.

    • setPath

      public void setPath(Path path)
      Update the path to follow.

      This exists so that you can reuse the path follower between autonomous paths and movements.

      Parameters:
      path - the path to follow

    • getPath

      public Path getPath()
      Returns the path that the robot is following.
      Returns:

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(double speed)
      Sets the speed of the robot.
      Parameters:
      speed - the goal speed of the robot (in your units)

    • getSpeed

      public double getSpeed()
      Returns the speed of the robot.
      Returns:
      the speed of the robot

    • setPrecision

      public void setPrecision(double precision)
      Sets the precision of the path follower.

      (how close the robot needs to be to the point to move on)

      Parameters:
      precision - the precision of the path follower (your units)

    • setSlowdownKP

      public void setSlowdownKP(double kP)
      Sets the kP of the slowdown distance.

      (proporational to the distance)

      Parameters:
      kP -

    • getLoopTime

      public double getLoopTime()
      Returns the measured looptime of the path follower (useful for simulation).
      Returns:
      the measured looptime of the path follower (seconds)
